original_title: The Strong Arm Squad of the Future
overview: The Strong Arm Squad of the Future originated within the early newsreel The Mutual Weekly and survives only as an undated fragment. "This grim little cartoon comments on the present by foretelling a future under gender-inverted militias—which take power thanks to the punch line: “VOTES FOR WOMEN.” —Scott Simmon
title: The Strong Arm Squad of the Future
